name: nextjs-simple-boilerplate
description: A Next.js, Firebase and Redux boilerplate that we use internally
author: shaunsaker <shaun@aux.co.za>

scripts.update-changelog: yarn run auto-changelog && git add . && git commit -m 'Update Changelog' && git push
scripts.update-tags: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.publish: yarn run update-changelog && yarn run update-tags
scripts.build-development: cp ./src/app/.env.dev ./src/app/.env && yarn run build && yarn run export && yarn run build-storybook
scripts.build-testing: cp ./src/app/.env.testing ./src/app/.env && yarn run build && yarn run export && yarn run build-storybook
scripts.build-staging: cp ./src/app/.env.staging ./src/app/.env && yarn run build && yarn run export && yarn run build-storybook
scripts.build-production: cp ./src/app/.env.prod ./src/app/.env && yarn run build && yarn run export && yarn run build-storybook
scripts.deploy-development: firebase use development && yarn run deploy
scripts.deploy-testing: firebase use testing && yarn run deploy
scripts.deploy-staging: firebase use staging && yarn run deploy
scripts.deploy-production: firebase use production && yarn run deploy
scripts.deploy-all-no-prod: yarn run build-development && yarn run deploy-development && yarn run build-testing && yarn run deploy-testing && yarn run build-staging && yarn run deploy-staging
scripts.deploy-all: yarn run build-development && yarn run deploy-development && yarn run build-testing && yarn run deploy-testing && yarn run build-staging && yarn run deploy-staging && yarn run build-production && yarn run deploy-production
scripts.db-restore-all-no-prod: yarn run db-restore-development && yarn run db-restore-testing && yarn run db-restore-staging
scripts.db-restore-all: yarn run db-restore-development && yarn run db-restore-testing && yarn run db-restore-staging && yarn run db-restore-production
